title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Banking & Financial Services - Seychelles

description.narrative: The goal of this project is to assist the GoS in developing and maintaining a fair, safe, and stable financial sector that benefits and protects financial sector participants while maintaining public confidence in the financial system and supporting private sector-led economic growth. Project components will focus on: (1) implementing a new core banking system to facilitate centralized operational processes within the CBS; (2) strengthening the capacity of CBS banking supervision staff to adequately regulate and supervise the banking sector; (3) establishing a deposit insurance regime that protects depositors in the event of bank failures and maintains public confidence in the financial sector; (4) developing and implementing an effective resolution framework that allows for the orderly resolution of failed financial institutions; and (5) developing an automated data portal for inbound financial institution reporting to support enhanced offsite analysis of financial institution risks.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito
